title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 361.4 - Periodic reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 361.4 - Periodic reports

State Regulations
(a) Each self-insurer, and each employer, shall file annually verified reports in
form prescribed by the chair, which (without limitations) shall report the
following information: (1)
number of eligible
employees; (2)
amount of covered
payrolls; (3)
amount of employee
contributions; and
(4)
estimate of
amount of employee contributions in the ensuing year. (b) When the information is deemed necessary, the chair or the Superintendent of Financial Services may require the
self-insurer to submit reports to the Department of Financial Services as set
forth in Department of Financial Services regulations at 11 NYCRR Part
363. (c) Other reports requested by
the chair pursuant to subdivision (b) of this section shall be filed not later
than 15 days after notice of such requirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
361.4

Amended

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
